updateTravelZone

public static void updateTravelZone(double[] travelTimeToWork,
                                    double[] weekdaysCongestion,
                                    double[] weekendCongestion)
Updates table of travel_zone_data including fields weekdays_congestion,travel_time_to_work,weekend_congestion, tz_liveability , while the tz_liveability is calculated by following formula. NOTE: the liveability is get by formula: housing_availability*0.3+weekdays_congestion*0.3+travel_time_to_work*0.3+beach_proximity*0.1 from travel_zone_data in the database it violates 3NF

Parameters:
travelTimeToWork - the array contains value of travel time to work and sorts by travel zone gid
weekdaysCongestion - the array contains value of weekdays congestion and sorts by travel zone gid
weekendCongestion - the array contains value of weekend congestion and sorts by travel zone gid

updateRoadNetwork

public static void updateRoadNetwork(double[][] weekdaysDensity,
                                     double[][] weekendDensity)
Updates the table of road_network including fields weekdays_density, weekend_density

Parameters:
weekdaysDensity - the double array contains value of weekdays density. the first column is gid of road_network, and the second column is the value of related weekdays density value
weekendDensity - the double array contains value of weekend density. the first column is gid of road_network, and the second column is the value of related weekend density value

getTravelZoneInformation
